title: Bug 22276[DND] Confirmation to move readonly file opens twice
description: Bug 22276[DND] Confirmation to move readonly file opens twice
OB: Drag&Drop a readonly file from one project to another in the Navigator.Aconfirmation dialog appears to confirm the move of the file.If you press "No"on the confirmation dialog, the dialog opens again asking the same question.
SR: Drag&Drop a readonly file from one project to another in the Navigator.Aconfirmation dialog appears to confirm the move of the file.If you press "No"on the confirmation dialog, the dialog opens again asking the same question.
